SelectDevice: Select at least one output device

mixModeTooltips.Stereo: Passes both left and right channels unchanged to all outputs
mixModeTooltips.Left: Copies left channel to both left and right outputs
mixModeTooltips.Right: Copies right channel to both left and right outputs
mixModeTooltips.Center: Mixes left and right channels (L+R)/2 and outputs to all channels
mixModeTooltips.FrontLeft: Copies left channel to both left and right outputs (same as Left)
mixModeTooltips.FrontRight: Copies right channel to both left and right outputs (same as Right)
mixModeTooltips.BackLeft: Outputs left channel at 85% volume to both left and right channels
mixModeTooltips.BackRight: Outputs right channel at 85% volume to both left and right channels
mixModeTooltips.BackSurround: Mixes left and right channels and outputs mono to all channels
mixModeTooltips.Subwoofer: Mixes left and right channels with 1.3x bass boost and outputs to all channels
